  1. net.dapete.exceptional
  2. net.dapete.exceptional.function

Uses of Package
net.dapete.exceptional.function

Packages that use net.dapete.exceptional.function
Package
Description
net.dapete.exceptional
This package provides utilities for handling checked exceptions in functional interfaces and Streams.
net.dapete.exceptional.function
This package contains equivalents of functional interfaces from java.util.function (and Runnable) that can throw exceptions.

  • Classes in net.dapete.exceptional.function used by net.dapete.exceptional.function
    Class
    Description
    ExceptionalDoubleUnaryOperator
    Equivalent of a DoubleUnaryOperator that can throw exceptions.
    ExceptionalIntUnaryOperator
    Equivalent of an IntUnaryOperator that can throw exceptions.
    ExceptionalLongUnaryOperator
    Equivalent of a LongUnaryOperator that can throw exceptions.
    ExceptionalUnaryOperator
    Equivalent of a UnaryOperator that can throw exceptions.
    Wrappable
    Interfaces which extend this can wrap a lambda using the Wrappable.wrap() method, allowing it to be used in contexts where exceptions are not allowed to be thrown directly.
